    • Method Detail

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String[][] getUsers()
        Gets a String[][] of data about all the users. The data being: username, name (first + last name), and telephone
        Returns:
        A two-dimensional array of user data. Each row is a user, and each collumn username, name and telephone number.

      • getAthletes

        public java.lang.String[][] getAthletes()
        Gets a String[][] of data about all the athletes. That being name (first+last name), nationality, sport and athleteID
        Returns:
        Each row is a different athlete. Each collumn: name (first+last name), nationality, sport and athleteID (in that order)

      • getRows

        public int getRows(java.sql.ResultSet res)
        Returns the number of rows in a ResultSet
        Parameters:
        res - ResultSet from a database query
        Returns:
        int
